_header: Some time in Rome a pope there was
_description: The trental of Saint Gregory — 101 couplets

CULKk16.First Lines:
Sum tyme in rome a pope þer wasthat hadde a moder fayre of
                    face…
CULKk16.Last Lines:
…fowre aungellys he sey with her gooIn to blysse there god
                    bryng ows to
CULKk16.Editions:
Kaufmann,  Albert. 
             Trentalle Sancti Gregorii; eine mittelenglische Legende.
Erlanger Beiträge
         3. Erlangen and Leipzig: Deichert, 1889: 25.

BLHar3810.First Lines: Sum tyme in rome a pope ther wasþat had a moder fayre of face…
BLHar3810.Last Lines: …And that it so may beIhesu of pyte thow graunte it me
BLHar3810.Editions:
Jordan,  Richard. 
             “Das ‘Trentalle Gregorii’ in der Handschrift Harley
                3810.” 
             Englische Studien
         40 (1909): 351-71: 351.

NLS1931.First Lines:
Some tyme in rome a pope þer wasþat hade a modur ffull
                    fayre of face…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…here endes þe trentall of gergoriGod of oure soles haue
                    merci
